title: A storm-damaged powerline killed Manendra. What could have been different?
description: The death of a Brisbane man after a storm shone a spotlight on the dangers of overhead powerlines in a storm-prone state.
content:
When Manendra Kopparthi tragically removed a fallen branch on a wet Queensland road, he was repeating a good-citizen ethos for which the 30-year-old was renowned.

title: South-east Queensland hit by two consecutive days of giant hail
description: Hundreds of residents remain without power after Saturday's wild storms, while others are tallying the cost of giant hail to their properties, cars and homes.
content:
South-east and southern Queensland residents are being warned of the possibility of more storms to come, after parts of the region were lashed by giant hail over the weekend.

title: Power restored after Alice Springs lashed by 'fierce' storm
description: A severe thunderstorm brought down trees and cut power for several hours in Alice Springs.
content:
A severe thunderstorm has brought down trees and cut power for several hours in Alice Springs.
